title: Best of The Program | Guests: Rudy Atallah & Saber Nasseri | 8/23/21
description:
Pat Gray joins to further discuss what the Taliban have been doing since their Afghanistan takeover and how a major terrorist is helping shape Afghanistan’s future. Nazarene Fund COO Rudy Atallah gives an update on the rescue mission, but the two things holding the organization back from fulfilling its mission are the Taliban and America’s own State Department. Afghan interpreter Saber Nasseri calls to discuss his experiences in Afghanistan and how his family is being targeted.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
